name: Cosmic Bowling
text:
Looking for a fun daytime or late night activity? Our 8 Lane Bowling Center is open to the public, Sunday-Thursday, 11:00am- 10:00pm, and Friday-Saturday 11:00am-11:00pm. We offer automated scoring, bumper bowling, and an extraordinary experience featuring lights, glowing pins, and a state-of-the-art sound system. Ask about our Bowling Party Rooms! Cost is $8.00 person, per game.

  • (570) 722-9111
  • Sun - Thurs: 10am-11pm
    Fri - Sat: 10am-Midnight
  • $8.00 Person | Per Game
